author: dkulp
msg: Updates for new maven plugins, get "mvn site" working
* Update top level pom to use latest versions of maven plugins except for surefire
* Update site generation to not use snapshot plugins (codehaus snapshot server is down)
* Remove dependency on tools.jar for celtix-tools so "mvn site" won't NullPointerException.  (bug in maven)
